TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReplicatorActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity
Public NotInheritable Class ReplicatorActivity Inherits CompositeActivity

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 运行子活动的多个实例。

span.span: Runs multiple instances of a child activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 类似于代码中的 `for each` 语句。The is similar to a `for each` statement in code. 如果出现需要对许多不同实体重复同一函数的任务，则使用 解决方案可能比 更好。If you are presented with a task in which you repeat the same function on many different entities, may be a better solution than . 默认情况下，在所有子实例结束后， 结束。By default, a is completed when all child instances have completed. 可以用活动完成时要使用的自定义条件重写此行为。You can override this behavior with a custom condition to use when the activity finishes. 如果在所有子实例结束前此条件计算结果为 `true`，则会取消所有正在运行的未完成子实例。If this condition evaluates to `true` before all child instances have completed, then any running incomplete child instances are canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例并为 事件定义处理程序。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class and define a handler for the event. 此代码示例摘自 SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs 文件中的“复制器”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Replicator SDK Sample from the SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用复制](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858)器。For more information, see [Using Replicator](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性为 编写器提供一种简便方法，可以在无需维护自己的集合或评估动态活动集的情况下获取此信息。This property allows the writer an easy way to get this information without having to maintain their own collection or evaluate over a dynamic activity set.

summary.span: 紧接在初始化子活动实例后发生。

span.span: Occurs immediately after a child activity is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已订阅此事件，则每次在为 `Children` 集合中的项创建子活动的实例时都引发此事件。If subscribed to, this event is raised every time that an instance of the child activity is created for an item in the `Children` collection. `Children` 集合通过 事件处理程序的 设置。The `Children` collection is set through the of the event handler. 在调用中传递子 实例，以便 能够设置子级上的值。The child instance is passed in the call so that the can set values on the child. 还传递 集合中相关的 `Children` 对象。The relevant object from the `Children` collection is also passed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 事件的值。The following code example shows how to set the value of the event. 此代码示例摘自 SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs 文件中的“复制器”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Replicator SDK sample from the SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用复制](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858)器。For more information, see [Using Replicator](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858). summary.span: 获取正在运行的子活动实例的数组。

span.span: Gets an array of running child activity instances.

value.span: 当前正在运行的子活动实例的数组。

span.span: An array of currently running child activity instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的活动实例是在 内包含的活动类型的实例。The activity instances returned by this property are the instances of the activity type that are contained within the . 如果 以顺序模式运行，则数组将最多只能包含一个活动；如果以并行模式运行，则数组将包含当前正在运行的所有实例。If the is running in sequence mode, the array contains no more than one activity; if running in parallel mode the array contains all instances that are currently running.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 何时应完成的完成条件。

span.span: Gets or sets a completion condition that indicates when the should finish.
An that determines whether the is finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此默认条件是若要完成 ，所有子实例必须完成。This default condition is that all child instances must complete for the to be completed. 与 一样，可以使用规则条件或代码条件指定完成条件。As with a , you can specify the completion condition using a rule condition or code condition. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性的值设置为 `null`，这意味着 `ReplicatorActivity` 永远都不会关闭。The following code example shows how to set the value of the property to `null`, which means the `ReplicatorActivity` never closes. 此代码示例摘自 SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs 文件中的“复制器”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Replicator SDK Sample from the SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用复制](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858)器。For more information, see [Using Replicator](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858).
